replies.replyComment: Mohomad husssin Imran khan me welwe thmai owa elyta enna Ona welwa. Dan thamai api mula indala okkoma adala balnna Ona . Monwda Mechchra kal oye samahara eun kare mokda une mokda wenne mokakda kranna hdnne kyla. Me welwe as wahagena amthka krala dammoth api iwrai. Me para nam ewwa wenne ne. Amathaka krannema ne. Api Samanya minissu widyta paarata behela owa hoynwa. Eka nwththnna mokekta wth be. Mula indn agatama hoynawa. Me para amthka wenna dnne ne katwth. Kage kageda show kyla houses oppu karala balala Gannam api. Mona lokkek unath podima ekek unath ape jaathiya nethi karanna hadana para ballek nam uwa ithuru karnne ne. Nethima karala danwa. Okkoma hoyanwa eka katawth Dan nwaththnna be . Oye samaharu hithagena inna ewa mehe wenne ne . üòå meka sinhala baudda ratak eka wens karnna eka para ballonta be. Eka rekaganna api Ona ekek ona deyak kranwa
